Package i5.las2peer.tools

Class WaiterThread<T>

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
i5.las2peer.tools.WaiterThread<T>
Type Parameters:
T -
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class WaiterThread<T> extends Thread
A simple thread waiting for a result.
